name: Creeping Me Out: Hex Night (demo)
description:
This is a short demo of the "high spec" build, intended for all amigas with an 020, 2MB Chip, and 1MB fast RAM. There will be a base A1200/CD32 version that doesn't require any fast RAM, but that will happen closer to the end of the game's development. It's the same demo I released last year but with many improvements, the password section included, etc.

You can find out a bit more about this project at my site.. As well as on MixelsLab Twitch where I stream the game's development frequently!
